entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:06 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
